subtitle: Unlock the lore, stats, and secrets of every champion. Begin your epic journey now.
home_introduction: League of Legends isn't just a game – it's a world teeming with stories, battles, and unique champions. Whether you're a seasoned summoner or new to the rift, our platform provides a deep dive to LoL champions.
footer_rights: All champion images, names, and related indicia are © and ™ Riot Games. This platform is an independent project and is not affiliated with Riot Games.

title.home: Dive into the World of League of Legends
title.about_page: Behind the Scenes of League of Champions
title.questions_or_hints: Do you have hints or questions?

projects_origin_description: The project was born out of my desire to apply the skills I acquired during a course on React. Looking for an ideal context on which to practice, I discovered the League Of Legends API. Having always been fascinated by the game, I seized the opportunity and decided to bring this site to life.
site_functionality_description: From detailed champion fact sheets to powerful search tools and customized filters, League of Champions is designed with the user in mind. Explore, learn and immerse yourself in the world of LoL like never before.
